title: Tesla reports record profits
content: Tesla exceeded all expectations with stellar Q4 results. Revenue up 50%.

title: Apple faces supply chain issues
content: Production delays affect iPhone availability. Stock drops 5%.

title: Microsoft launches new AI features
content: The company integrates ChatGPT into Office suite. Users excited.

title: Neutral update on Tesla operations
content: The company maintains steady production levels in Q1.

title: Apple announces record App Store revenue
content: App Store generates $100 billion in 2023. Developers celebrate.
